conversation.speaker: Red Witch
conversation.text: Oh my goodness, do my eyes deceive me? A little wizard kitten! Here kitty kitty~ come to mama!

conversation.speaker: Red Witch
conversation.text: Wh—YOU CAN SPEAK? WATCH YOUR TONGUE YOU LITTLE RAT—err CAT!

conversation.speaker: Red Witch
conversation.text: Of course I can understand you. I am the esteemed Red Witch after all~

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Meow meow meow... (Let me guess, you'll make short work of me again? Just like your sister, right?)

conversation.speaker: Red Witch
conversation.text: My sister... what business do you have with my sister?

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Meow! MIMIMIMI! (I KICKED HER BUTT! MUHAHAUHUAHUAHA!!!)

conversation.speaker: Mimi
conversation.text: Meow meow meow! Meow. meow. (And I'll kick your butt too unless you hand over the fairy you stole. Right. now.)

conversation.speaker: Red Witch
conversation.text: Pft, as if. I'm not like my idiot sister. Today you meet your end, and after I'm through with you, I'll use this fairy to burn down the rest of your flea-ridden forest!
